title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your indoor or garden space! Crafted from sturdy concrete with a sleek graphite finish and a beautiful marble effect base, this mini fire pit is not only stylish but also highly functional.

Powered by eco-friendly bio ethanol fuel, this fire pit offers a burn time of over 1 hour, making it perfect for creating a warm and cozy atmosphere. The stainless steel burn cup ensures safety, while the rapid cooling feature allows for quick and easy extinguishing with the included flat stainless steel extinguisher tool.

But that's not all - the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit is also portable, making it easy to move from indoors to your garden or patio. And with its heat-dissipating marble effect base, you can enjoy the warmth and ambiance without worrying about damaging your table or furniture.

Whether you're looking to create a cozy atmosphere for a romantic night in or want to roast some marshmallows and make s'mores with the family, this tabletop fire pit has got you covered. Plus, with its ceramic wool insert, you can enjoy increased burn time and efficiency.

So why wait? Add the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit to your home today and experience the warmth and ambiance of a personal fireplace in any setting!
